# Fish Length Analysis

Analysis fish length data from Gaeta et al.

### Set-Up

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
fish <- read_csv("data_raw/Gaeta_etal_CLC_data.csv")
```

```{r}
glimpse(fish)
```

```{r}
fish %>% 
  group_by(lakeid) %>% 
  summarize(min_scale_length = min(scalelength, na.rm = T),
            max_scale_length = max(scalelength, na.rm = T))
```
